S2.T1.caption: TABLE I: Notations
references:
This section defines the problem formulations of relevant learning frameworks.
We categorize learning frameworks into eight major branches depending on their problem settings: offline learning, online learning, continual learning (CL), meta-learning, meta-online learning (MOL), meta-continual learning (MCL), online meta-learning (OML), and continual meta-learning (CML).
The methodologies to tackle these problems will be respectively described in §3-6.
Fig. 1 visualizes the key characteristics and the data structure of each learning framework, and Table I summarizes our unified notations used throughout this paper.
